MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY13 and SY14 postcode areas of Whitchurch and Malpas, affecting properties in St Wenefredes Green and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:30pm to complete repairs following a grounded overhead line. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:10pm on 27th January 2021.
